name: Knife Demon
description:
You was sent to the Earth to make your way to the president and kill him, so the Hell could get more power and transfer more powerfull demons into human world.

But it won't be easy. You'll die if someone shoot you just once, and all you can do is throw knives.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

I started making this game for the "Bored Pixels" game jam with theme "You are not the hero", but i couldn't finish it in a week. So this game was made in 13 days.  It's my first game, so i don't expect it to be very good, but i just wanted to try what it's like to make a game. 

I hope you'll enjoy it.
